CustomField.description: URL-friendly brand identifier used for Experience Cloud routing and theming (e.g., /b/donut-king/menu). Must be lowercase letters/numbers with single hyphens only.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a unique URL slug in lowercase using letters/numbers and hyphens only. No spaces, underscores, or trailing hyphens. Example: donut-king.
CustomField.label: Domain Slug
